ema hasthiya banda sitigasata wadunu akunin me maranaya siduwa athi athara, me akuna aliya banda siti gasata pamanak nowa pradeshaye niwasa kihipayakatama wadi athi athara, in niwes gananawaka rupawahini, shithakarana aadiyata hani siduwa thibe.esema me akunu pahara hethuwen niwasa kihipayaka biththi walatada hani siduwa athi athara, akune dadi shabdayen sihisunwa kanthawak da rohal gatha kara thibe.kotte rajamaha wiharaye thalangama dewananda, kudabibule indarathana, neluwe silawimala yana himiwarun athulu bhikshun wahansela rasakma siddhiya wu sthanayata pamini athara peraharawal aadi siyalu aagamika katayuthuwalata sahabhagi wu lanka aliyage me anapekshitha wiyowen ema bhikshun wahansela da balawath kampanayakata pathwa sitina ayuru daka ganimata hakiwini.pashu waidya jayanthi alahakon mahathmiya saha ingiriya hadisi marana parikshaka udayarathna liyanage mahatha ingiriya polisiya samanga ekwa meheyawana lada mulika parikshanawalin pasu meya akunu paharak hethuwen siduwu hadisi maranayak bawata thiranaya kala athara, pasuwa ema sthanayedima aagamika katayuthu sidu kirimen pasu aliyage bhumidana katayuthu sidu karana ladi..
